net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler

Class FMLThrowingEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.EventBus
      • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.FMLThrowingEventBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventExceptionHandler

    public class FMLThrowingEventBus
extends EventBus
    Event bus that allows exceptions thrown by the exception handler to propagate. TODO remove this in 1.13 and stop using the guava event bus
